---
title: Iliocapsularis
subtitle: Muscle
---




# Origin
Anterior medial hip capsule @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020

# Insertion

Inserts just distal to the lesser trochanter so that it overlies the anterior hip capsule @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020

# Action

Its function is to help stabilize and tighten the anterior hip capsule

# Function

The iliocapsularis muscle has been found to be hypertrophied in dysplastic hips relative to normal hips
